PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation who have progressed after at least one prior systemic therapy.
PICOs.Comparator: Docetaxel (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours)
PICOs.Outcomes: Progression-free survival, overall survival, health-related quality of life, side effects

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation who have progressed after at least one prior systemic therapy.
PICOs.Comparator: Pemetrexed (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours and except in cases of predominantly squamous histology)
PICOs.Outcomes: Progression-free survival, overall survival, health-related quality of life, side effects

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation who have progressed after at least one prior systemic therapy.
PICOs.Comparator: Nivolumab (only for patients with PD-L1 expressing tumours)
PICOs.Outcomes: Progression-free survival, overall survival, health-related quality of life, side effects

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation who have progressed after at least one prior systemic therapy.
PICOs.Comparator: Pembrolizumab (only for patients with PD-L1 expressing tumours)
PICOs.Outcomes: Progression-free survival, overall survival, health-related quality of life, side effects

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation who have progressed after at least one prior systemic therapy.
PICOs.Outcomes: Progression-free survival, overall survival, health-related quality of life, side effects

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation who have progressed after at least one prior systemic therapy.
PICOs.Comparator: Docetaxel in combination with nintedanib (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours and adenocarcinoma histology)
PICOs.Outcomes: Progression-free survival, overall survival, health-related quality of life, side effects
